ygData.subject: RE: Sonorous Clounding
ygData.msgSnippet: I decided to start a bard on the Test Server for those rare cases when Mith Marr is unavailable.  I got to level 2 in about 15 minutes doing the watch report
ygData.messageBody:
I decided to start a bard on the Test Server for those
rare cases when Mith Marr is unavailable. I got to
level 2 in about 15 minutes doing the watch report
quest running between the bard guild and the docks in
Qeynos. I was getting almost a bubble of xp a
circuit. I don't know if this is an upgrade or not
though.

Tomerrilin

--- Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...> wrote:
> > I got nearly a full level from turning in 6 gnoll
> teeth to the guy in S
> > Qeynos. So that certainly helped.
>
> wow... did they up the exp on those small quests
> a lot or what?
> I never got any exp from those when I was small, I
> got an item
> like a rusty sword, or a spell, and sometimes a
> moonstone. Now
> I hear you just get a moonstone.
>
> Harmonic.
>
>
